title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.735 - Compressor stations: storage of combustible materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.735 - Compressor stations: storage of combustible materials

State Regulations
(a) Flammable or combustible materials in
quantities beyond those required for everyday use, or other than those normally
used in compressor buildings, must be stored a safe distance from the
compressor building. (b) Aboveground oil or gasoline storage tanks must be protected in accordance with

National Fire Protection Association Standard No. 30 (as described in section
10.3
of this Title). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.735

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
